abstract: Alan D. Schwartz, the former chief executive of Bear Stearns, appears to be heading to Goldman Sachs, Fortune magazine reports.
snippet: Alan D. Schwartz, the former chief executive of Bear Stearns, appears to be heading to Goldman Sachs, Fortune magazine reports.
lead_paragraph: Since the fall of Bear Stearns in March 2008, Alan D. Schwartz, the firm’s chief executive, has been notably missing in action. Mr. Schwartz, a mergers and acquisitions banker, had the misfortune of taking charge of Bear just two months before it collapsed.

headline.main: Bear Stearns Ex-Chief Said to Be in Talks With Goldman
